text: Verners Edgards Kohs (born May 21, 1997) is a Latvian professional basketball player, who currently plays for Monbus Obradoiro of the Liga ACB. == Career == Kohs came through the youth ranks of BK Ventspils, before joining VEF Rīga in 2013. He made his debut for VEF’s senior team during the 2014-15 season. In January 2015, Kohs moved to Belgium, joining BC Oostende for a try-out, followed by a year in Spain, in which he mostly saw action for El Olivar Zaragoza in the LEB Silver, while appearing in one game for Liga ACB outfit CAI Zaragoza. He moved to Prague in 2016, joining the Get Better Academy which competes in the country’s second tier. In July 2017, he was signed by Obradoiro CAB of the Spanish Liga ACB and was then sent to LEB Oro side Club Ourense Baloncesto on loan. == International career == Representing Latvia, Kohs played at the 2013 under-16-, the 2015 under-18- and the 2016 under-20-European Championships. == References == == External links == * FIBA.com profile Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Basket Zaragoza players Category:BK VEF Rīga players Category:BK Ventspils players Category:Club Ourense Baloncesto players Category:Latvian expatriate basketball people in Spain Category:Latvian men's basketball players Category:Obradoiro CAB players Category:People from Ventspils Category:Power forwards (basketball)
title: Verners Kohs
